workshoptitle: Building Data Pipeline using Big Data Service

tutorials.title: Introduction to Oracle Big Data Service (BDS)
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Big Data Service

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set Up the BDS Environment Resources
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your Big Data Service environment resources before you can create clusters.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a BDS Hadoop Cluster
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to create a BDS Highly Available (HA) Hadoop cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Access a BDS Node Using a Public IP Address
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to map a node's private IP address to a public IP address

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Use Ambari and Hue to Access a BDS Cluster
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use Cloudera Manager (CM) and Hue to access a Big Data Service (BDS) cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 5:  Create a Hadoop Administrator User
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create a Hadoop Administrator(superuser) that will have full access to all the data and metadata on the cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Cleanse data and upload to Hive using Python (PySpark)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to cleanse data and upload to Object Storage and Hive table.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Run the Machine Learning, Data Science code using Jupyterhub
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to run the Machine Learning, Data Science code using Jupyterhub.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Visualize data using Oracle Analytics Cloud
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to identify and delete the resources that you have created in this workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Clean up Resources Used in the Workshop (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to identify and delete the resources that you have created in this workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
